1.title: No Poverty
1.description: Digging into the roots of poverty to shape a more equitable tomorrow.

2.title: Zero Hunger
2.description: Feeding insights into hunger, food systems, and nutrition—locally and globally.

3.title: Good Health and Well-being
3.description: Charting the path to healthier lives through data on care, disease, and well-being.

4.title: Quality Education
4.description: Revealing the state of learning across the nation—one region at a time.

5.title: Gender Equality
5.description: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls.

6.title: Clean Water and Sanitation
6.description: Tracing the link between clean water, sanitation, and public health resilience.

7.title: Affordable and Clean Energy
7.description: Fueling conversations on cleaner, cheaper, and smarter energy solutions.

8.title: Decent Work and Economic Growth
8.description: Following the flow of pesos, productivity, and prosperity.

9.title: Industry, Innovation, and Infrastructure
9.description: Visualizing the building blocks of national development—from funding to function.

10.title: Reduced Inequality
10.description: Spotlighting the invisible lines that divide—and how to bridge them.

11.title: Sustainable Cities and Communities
11.description: Zooming into city life to expose the heat, the smog, and the sprawl.

12.title: Responsible Consumption and Production
12.description: Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns.

13.title: Climate Action
13.description: Tracking emissions and transformations in our fight against climate change.

14.title: Life Below Water
14.description: Casting a wide net over marine life, fishery trends, and ocean health.

15.title: Life on Land
15.description: Following wildlife and climate clues to protect ecosystems on land.

16.title: Peace, Justice, and Strong Institutions
16.description: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all, and build effective, accountable, and inclusive institutions at all levels.

17.title: Partnerships for the Goals
17.description: Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development.
